full_threads.body:
Hi @andy @cindy

Sure, I was able to get it to 80+, but we may have to tell the client that they need to adjust the font sizes for mobile.

https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-phoenix-dx-com/lpzh9f6fdl?form_factor=mobile

Can we try and get the PageSpeed >80

Hopefully fixing the H1 will solve it
https://chatgpt.com/share/e/68651024-1350-8011-bd1c-677b7539686d

@andy @cindy @manuel
Let me know if this works for you?
https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-phoenix-dx-com/twrimszo0l?form_factor=mobile

action.text: Cindy Valderama assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@andy Lance and @manuel is on this but I have pulled in @joel for the mobile optimization which is the only pending item.

We have improved on desktop but the mobile score is still on 44 which is far from our standard and this needs further optimization.
@cindy - is someone on this? If not, lets give to lance to action asap.

action.text: Andy Crebar assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Site: https://phoenix-dx.com/

Requirements

1. Fix core website vitals for mobile and desktop to >80 for performance, accessibility and SEO
<https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-phoenix-dx-com/l97d704e5p?form_factor=desktop>

2. Optimise meta titles, descriptions, H1 and H2 tags with target
keywords for home page, services pages and case studies

3. Create detailed google document that Andy can send back to client
with before and after changes

4. Add time for 8 hours (to be charged as overages).

Hi Andy,
I got the approval for the service. Please let us know what you need from
us to start.

Cheers,

On Thu, 19 Jun 2025 at 10:34, Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Hi Patricia,

Sounds good - we're here to help when the time is right.

We're confident those technical SEO fixes will help the site.

Thanks again,
Andy

On Fri, Jun 13, 2025 at 3:24 PM Patricia Gailey <patricia@phoenix-dx.com>
wrote:

> Thank you, Andy
> I need to seek approval. I will return for you next week.
>
> Cheers,
>
> On Fri, 13 Jun 2025 at 13:58, Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
>
>> Hi Patricia + Julla,
>>
>> Thanks again for your time yesterday.
>>
>> The 'Recommended Actions' we'd suggest are:
>>
>> 1. Fix core website vitals
>> <https://pagespeed.web.dev/analysis/https-phoenix-dx-com/l97d704e5p?form_factor=desktop> for
>> mobile and desktop to >80 for performance, accessibility and SEO
>> 2. Optimise meta titles, descriptions, H1 and H2 tags with target
>> keywords for home page, services pages and case studies
>>
>> There is quite a bit of work to do here to clean up the site and get it
>> technically strong and estimate this would take around ~8 hours (which we'd
>> be happy to complete at a standard rate of $129 / hour).
>>
>> We'd be able to get this done before the end of the month.
>>
>> Would you like us to proceed?
>>
>> Thanks,
>> Andy
>>
